granted_patents.description: A list of granted patents that are similar to the submitted invention.

number.description: The official U.S. patent number assigned by the USPTO to a granted patent.

title.description: The full title of the granted patent, summarizing its subject matter and scope.

assignee.description: The company, organization, or individual to whom the rights of the patent have been assigned. Often the original inventor's employer or a licensing entity.

relevance.description: A brief description explaining how this patent overlaps with, relates to, or differs from the submitted invention. Focus on functional, technical, or conceptual similarity.

risk_level.description: An assessment of how likely this patent could pose a conflict during prosecution or enforcement. High = strong overlap; Medium = possible conflict; Low = different scope or industry.

source.description: The source from which the patent information is derived.
